title: Foster care in the U.S. - number of children waiting for adoption 2007 to 2018
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of children, with a total of 12 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2018 to 2012.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2012 to 2007.
gold: This statistic shows the number of children waiting for adoption in the United States from 2007 to 2018 . In 2018 , about 125,422 children in the U.S. were waiting to be adopted .
